description: A collection of circles in an egg-shaped formation next to a circular formation, with a squat, wide rectangular formation of circles behind them and a very thin rectangular formation extending upwards from between them. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is a grayish-dark blue triangle at the bottom of the thin rectangular formation and a pale, very thin greenish-blue triangle on the left side of the egg-shaped formation.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
